topic_metadata.title: How can I disable presentation title in header in touying (simple theme)?

posts.name: Tamas K. Papp
posts.cooked: I wish to maximize slide space. I am using the simple theme in touying, but it puts the presentation title above the slide title. How can I get rid of that?
posts.raw: I wish to maximize slide space. I am using the simple theme in touying, but it puts the presentation title above the slide title. How can I get rid of that?

posts.cooked:
Do you mean the header? The docs go over all the options you can change. In your case, itâ€™d be fixed with

#show: simple-theme.with(
  header: none
)
posts.raw:
Do you mean the header? The [docs](https://touying-typ.github.io/docs/themes/simple#initialization) go over all the options you can change. In your case, it'd be fixed with

```typ
#show: simple-theme.with(
  header: none
)
```
